table.name: countryregioncurrency
table.remarks: Cross-reference table mapping ISO currency codes to a country or region.

column.name: countryregioncode
column.remarks: ISO code for countries and regions. Foreign key to CountryRegion.CountryRegionCode.

column.name: currencycode
column.remarks: ISO standard currency code. Foreign key to Currency.CurrencyCode.

column.name: creditcardid
column.remarks: Primary key for CreditCard records.

column.name: cardtype
column.remarks: Credit card name.

column.name: cardnumber
column.remarks: Credit card number.

column.name: expmonth
column.remarks: Credit card expiration month.

column.name: expyear
column.remarks: Credit card expiration year.

table.name: currency
table.remarks: Lookup table containing standard ISO currencies.

column.name: currencycode
column.remarks: The ISO code for the Currency.

column.name: name
column.remarks: Currency name.

column.name: currencyrateid
column.remarks: Primary key for CurrencyRate records.

column.name: currencyratedate
column.remarks: Date and time the exchange rate was obtained.

column.name: fromcurrencycode
column.remarks: Exchange rate was converted from this currency code.

column.name: tocurrencycode
column.remarks: Exchange rate was converted to this currency code.

column.name: averagerate
column.remarks: Average exchange rate for the day.

column.name: endofdayrate
column.remarks: Final exchange rate for the day.

table.name: customer
table.remarks: Current customer information. Also see the Person and Store tables.

column.name: customerid
column.remarks: Primary key.

column.name: personid
column.remarks: Foreign key to Person.BusinessEntityID

column.name: storeid
column.remarks: Foreign key to Store.BusinessEntityID

column.name: territoryid
column.remarks: ID of the territory in which the customer is located. Foreign key to SalesTerritory.SalesTerritoryID.

table.name: personcreditcard
table.remarks: Cross-reference table mapping people to their credit card information in the CreditCard table.

column.name: businessentityid
column.remarks: Business entity identification number. Foreign key to Person.BusinessEntityID.

column.name: creditcardid
column.remarks: Credit card identification number. Foreign key to CreditCard.CreditCardID.

table.name: salesorderdetail
table.remarks: Individual products associated with a specific sales order. See SalesOrderHeader.

column.name: salesorderid
column.remarks: Primary key. Foreign key to SalesOrderHeader.SalesOrderID.

column.name: salesorderdetailid
column.remarks: Primary key. One incremental unique number per product sold.

column.name: carriertrackingnumber
column.remarks: Shipment tracking number supplied by the shipper.

column.name: orderqty
column.remarks: Quantity ordered per product.

column.name: productid
column.remarks: Product sold to customer. Foreign key to Product.ProductID.

column.name: specialofferid
column.remarks: Promotional code. Foreign key to SpecialOffer.SpecialOfferID.

column.name: unitprice
column.remarks: Selling price of a single product.

column.name: unitpricediscount
column.remarks: Discount amount.

column.name: salesorderid
column.remarks: Primary key.

column.name: revisionnumber
column.remarks: Incremental number to track changes to the sales order over time.

column.name: orderdate
column.remarks: Dates the sales order was created.

column.name: duedate
column.remarks: Date the order is due to the customer.

column.name: shipdate
column.remarks: Date the order was shipped to the customer.

column.name: status
column.remarks: Order current status. 1 = In process; 2 = Approved; 3 = Backordered; 4 = Rejected; 5 = Shipped; 6 = Cancelled

column.name: onlineorderflag
column.remarks: 0 = Order placed by sales person. 1 = Order placed online by customer.

column.name: purchaseordernumber
column.remarks: Customer purchase order number reference.

column.name: accountnumber
column.remarks: Financial accounting number reference.

column.name: customerid
column.remarks: Customer identification number. Foreign key to Customer.BusinessEntityID.

column.name: salespersonid
column.remarks: Sales person who created the sales order. Foreign key to SalesPerson.BusinessEntityID.

column.name: territoryid
column.remarks: Territory in which the sale was made. Foreign key to SalesTerritory.SalesTerritoryID.

column.name: billtoaddressid
column.remarks: Customer billing address. Foreign key to Address.AddressID.

column.name: shiptoaddressid
column.remarks: Customer shipping address. Foreign key to Address.AddressID.

column.name: shipmethodid
column.remarks: Shipping method. Foreign key to ShipMethod.ShipMethodID.

column.name: creditcardid
column.remarks: Credit card identification number. Foreign key to CreditCard.CreditCardID.

column.name: creditcardapprovalcode
column.remarks: Approval code provided by the credit card company.

column.name: currencyrateid
column.remarks: Currency exchange rate used. Foreign key to CurrencyRate.CurrencyRateID.

column.name: subtotal
column.remarks: Sales subtotal. Computed as SUM(SalesOrderDetail.LineTotal)for the appropriate SalesOrderID.

column.name: taxamt
column.remarks: Tax amount.

column.name: freight
column.remarks: Shipping cost.

column.name: totaldue
column.remarks: Total due from customer. Computed as Subtotal + TaxAmt + Freight.

column.name: comment
column.remarks: Sales representative comments.

table.name: salesorderheadersalesreason
table.remarks: Cross-reference table mapping sales orders to sales reason codes.

column.name: salesorderid
column.remarks: Primary key. Foreign key to SalesOrderHeader.SalesOrderID.

column.name: salesreasonid
column.remarks: Primary key. Foreign key to SalesReason.SalesReasonID.

column.name: businessentityid
column.remarks: Primary key for SalesPerson records. Foreign key to Employee.BusinessEntityID

column.name: territoryid
column.remarks: Territory currently assigned to. Foreign key to SalesTerritory.SalesTerritoryID.

column.name: salesquota
column.remarks: Projected yearly sales.

column.name: bonus
column.remarks: Bonus due if quota is met.

column.name: commissionpct
column.remarks: Commision percent received per sale.

column.name: salesytd
column.remarks: Sales total year to date.

column.name: saleslastyear
column.remarks: Sales total of previous year.

column.name: businessentityid
column.remarks: Sales person identification number. Foreign key to SalesPerson.BusinessEntityID.

column.name: quotadate
column.remarks: Sales quota date.

column.name: salesquota
column.remarks: Sales quota amount.

table.name: salesreason
table.remarks: Lookup table of customer purchase reasons.

column.name: salesreasonid
column.remarks: Primary key for SalesReason records.

column.name: name
column.remarks: Sales reason description.

column.name: reasontype
column.remarks: Category the sales reason belongs to.

column.name: salestaxrateid
column.remarks: Primary key for SalesTaxRate records.

column.name: stateprovinceid
column.remarks: State, province, or country/region the sales tax applies to.

column.name: taxtype
column.remarks: 1 = Tax applied to retail transactions, 2 = Tax applied to wholesale transactions, 3 = Tax applied to all sales (retail and wholesale) transactions.

column.name: taxrate
column.remarks: Tax rate amount.

column.name: name
column.remarks: Tax rate description.

column.name: territoryid
column.remarks: Primary key for SalesTerritory records.

column.name: name
column.remarks: Sales territory description

column.name: countryregioncode
column.remarks: ISO standard country or region code. Foreign key to CountryRegion.CountryRegionCode.

column.name: group
column.remarks: Geographic area to which the sales territory belong.

column.name: salesytd
column.remarks: Sales in the territory year to date.

column.name: saleslastyear
column.remarks: Sales in the territory the previous year.

column.name: costytd
column.remarks: Business costs in the territory year to date.

column.name: costlastyear
column.remarks: Business costs in the territory the previous year.

table.name: salesterritoryhistory
table.remarks: Sales representative transfers to other sales territories.

column.name: businessentityid
column.remarks: Primary key. The sales rep. Foreign key to SalesPerson.BusinessEntityID.

column.name: territoryid
column.remarks: Primary key. Territory identification number. Foreign key to SalesTerritory.SalesTerritoryID.

column.name: startdate
column.remarks: Primary key. Date the sales representive started work in the territory.

column.name: enddate
column.remarks: Date the sales representative left work in the territory.

table.name: shoppingcartitem
table.remarks: Contains online customer orders until the order is submitted or cancelled.

column.name: shoppingcartitemid
column.remarks: Primary key for ShoppingCartItem records.

column.name: shoppingcartid
column.remarks: Shopping cart identification number.

column.name: quantity
column.remarks: Product quantity ordered.

column.name: productid
column.remarks: Product ordered. Foreign key to Product.ProductID.

column.name: datecreated
column.remarks: Date the time the record was created.

column.name: specialofferid
column.remarks: Primary key for SpecialOffer records.

column.name: description
column.remarks: Discount description.

column.name: discountpct
column.remarks: Discount precentage.

column.name: type
column.remarks: Discount type category.

column.name: category
column.remarks: Group the discount applies to such as Reseller or Customer.

column.name: startdate
column.remarks: Discount start date.

column.name: enddate
column.remarks: Discount end date.

column.name: minqty
column.remarks: Minimum discount percent allowed.

column.name: maxqty
column.remarks: Maximum discount percent allowed.

table.name: specialofferproduct
table.remarks: Cross-reference table mapping products to special offer discounts.

column.name: specialofferid
column.remarks: Primary key for SpecialOfferProduct records.

column.name: productid
column.remarks: Product identification number. Foreign key to Product.ProductID.

column.name: businessentityid
column.remarks: Primary key. Foreign key to Customer.BusinessEntityID.

column.name: name
column.remarks: Name of the store.

column.name: salespersonid
column.remarks: ID of the sales person assigned to the customer. Foreign key to SalesPerson.BusinessEntityID.

column.name: demographics
column.remarks: Demographic informationg about the store such as the number of employees, annual sales and store type.
